body_html: @soumith that will be even worse, because every process will need to load the dataset from scratch (without any sharing), so there will be a single jump in the memory usage equal to what fork uses only at the end of the epoch.

body: @soumith that will be even worse, because every process will need to load the dataset from scratch (without any sharing), so there will be a single jump in the memory usage equal to what fork uses only at the end of the epoch.
